Craft an item of type: white_bed
inventory=[{"type": "carrot", "quantity": 39, "index": 13}, {"type": "zoglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 13, "index": 15}, {"type": "dark_oak_fence_gate", "quantity": 28, "index": 16}, {"type": "grass_block", "quantity": 35, "index": 18}, {"type": "red_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 15, "index": 19}, {"type": "glistering_melon_slice", "quantity": 30, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "acacia_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_wood", "quantity": 13, "index": 39}]

thought: To craft an white bed, I need to place 3 white wool on top of 3 acacia planks in the crafting grid. The first step is to place the stripped oak wood into the crafting grid and then craft the acacia planks.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

thought: I have crafted the acacia planks, and so I will move them into the inventory to make space for crafting the white bed.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: The crafting recipe for a white bed requires three pieces of wool on top of three pieces of wood. The inventory contains 3 pieces of white wool in slot 34. Therefore, I will move one piece of white wool to the crafting grid in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1
